pkgmetadata.longdescription: Totem is movie player for the GNOME desktop. It features a playlist, fullscreen mode, seek and volume controls, as well as a pretty complete keyboard navigation. It comes with added functionality such as a video thumbnailer for Nautilus, Nautilus properties tab and a webcam utility.

use.flag: Enable support for user-presence detection via the user's bluetooth handset using net-wireless/bluez
Install browser plugin for playing embedded Adobe Flash videos. Warning: breaks non-video Flash objects on many websites.
Enable support for controlling Totem with a remote control using app-misc/lirc
Enable support for searching media files using the indexer app-misc/tracker
Build the plugin to inject events to gnome-extra/zeitgeist
